text:
I'm trying to write an email with *if/else statements* but it seems that it doesn't work.
I use the hubl function *personalization_token* to get the value of the property with default value to empty string.
If I check `value != ""` the compiler doesn't enter in IF statement but it enters in ELSE statement.

I've seen in the If/Else docs that I must enable "_programmable email for the module_." so I've created an Email Template with `isEnabledForEmailV3Rendering: true`.

I've seen that this feature is in beta version so I'd like to know if it's a stable feature and the roadmap of this feature.

Otherwise is there a way to implement IF/ELSE in email template?
